text: 500 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS 4.14 Westferry / Park Place Figure 56: 4.14 Westferry / Park Place (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Tower Hamlets Local Plan 501 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS |Site information|Details| ||| |Address|West Ferry Road/West India Avenue| |Area [ha]|0.68| |Ward|Canary Wharf| |PTAL [2031]|6a| |Planning designations|z Area of substandard air quality z Skyline of Strategic Importance z Flood risk area z Area of deficiency of access to nature z Site of Importance for Nature Conservation (Millwall and West India Docks, adjacent to the site) z Town Centre (Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre) z Preferred Office Location (Canary Wharf Fringe) z Tall Building Zone (Canary Wharf) z Archaeological Priority Area (Isle of Dogs, tier 3) z Statutory listed buildings (Quay Walls, Copings and Buttresses to Import Dock and Export Dock, Grade I)|
